1.3.0.name: wordpress/meta-tags-optimization
1.3.0.description:
Check Meta Title, Meta Keywords(s) and Meta Description on posts and pages and consult with a seo expert on a single click.

Importance

Everyone knows that to obtain high search engine rankings for your posts/pages all you have to do is optimize your meta tags information as much as you can do. This plugins helps you to achieve this.

Usage:

It's easy! Once activated, check how meta tags are optimized from a edit posts or pages. Below description, a nice and easy to understand blocked "Meta Tags Optimization "available.

Notes:

This plugin for WordPress, the publicly available If you experience any problems with the plugin, feel free to contact me.
